001package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
002
003import java.awt.Shape;
004import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
005import java.awt.event.MouseListener;
006import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
007
008import ij.IJ;
009import ij.ImagePlus;
010import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
011import ij.gui.ImageCanvas;
012import ij.gui.Overlay;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.nonlinear.LogPolarMapping2;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
020import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
021import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of 2D log-polar mapping. Two mapping
026 * types are available (Version1, Version2). See Sec. 21.1.6 of [1] for details
027 * and examples. The plugin works interactively. Once started, the current mouse
028 * position specifies the transformation's center point. A new image with
029 * radius/angle coordinates is opened and continuously updated, until the plugin
030 * is terminated. The circular source grid is displayed as a graphic overlay.
031 * </p>
032 * <p>
033 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
034 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
035 * </p>
036 * 
037 * @author WB
038 * @version 2022/11/16
039 */
040public class LogPolar_Mapping_Demo implements PlugInFilter, MouseListener {
041        
042        private static int P = 60;              // number of radial steps
043        private static int Q = 100;             // number of angular steps
044        private double rmin, rmax;              // min/max radius (determined by image size)
045        
046        private static boolean ShowSamplingGrid = true; 
047        private static BasicAwtColor OverlayColorChoice = BasicAwtColor.Green;
048        private static float OverlayStrokeWidth = 0.2f;
049        
050        private ImagePlus sourceIm;
051        private ImageCanvas sourceCv;
052        private ImageProcessor sourceIp;
053        private ImageProcessor targetIp;
054        private ImagePlus targetIm;     
055        private Mapping2D mapping;
056        private String title;
057        
058        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
059
060        @Override
061        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
062                this.sourceIm = im;
063                return DOES_ALL;
064        }
065        
066        @Override
067        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
068                rmax = Math.hypot(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight()) / 3;
069                rmin = rmax / 75;
070                
071                if (!getUserInput()) {
072                        return;
073                }
074                
075                this.sourceIp = ip;
076                this.targetIp = sourceIp.createProcessor(P, Q);
077                this.targetIm = new ImagePlus("Log Polar Image", targetIp);
078                this.sourceCv = sourceIm.getWindow().getCanvas();
079                this.sourceCv.addMouseListener(this);
080                //sourceCv.addMouseMotionListener(this);
081                this.sourceIm.setOverlay(null);
082                this.title = sourceIm.getTitle();
083                this.sourceIm.setTitle(title + " [RUNNING]");
084                this.sourceIm.updateAndRepaintWindow();
085                IJ.wait(100);
086        }
087        
088        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
089        
090        private void mapAndUpdate(double xc, double yc) {
091                this.mapping = new LogPolarMapping2(xc, yc, P, Q, rmax, rmin).getInverse();
092                new ImageMapper(mapping).map(sourceIp, targetIp);               
093                targetIm.show();
094                targetIm.updateAndDraw();
095                if (ShowSamplingGrid) {
096                        sourceIm.setOverlay(getSupportRegionOverlay(xc, yc));
097                        sourceIm.updateAndDraw();
098                }
099        }
100
101        void finish() {
102                sourceIm.setTitle(title);
103                sourceCv.removeMouseListener(this);
104        }
105        
106        // --------- generate source grid overlay ---------------
107        
108        private Overlay getSupportRegionOverlay(double xc, double yc) {
109                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
110                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(OverlayStrokeWidth, OverlayColorChoice.getColor());
111                ola.setStroke(stroke);
112                
113                for (int i = 0; i < P; i++) {
114                        ola.addShape(makeCircle(xc, yc, i));
115                }       
116                for (int j = 0; j < Q; j++) {
117                        ola.addShape(makeSpoke(xc, yc, j));
118                }
119                
120                return ola.getOverlay();
121        }
122        
123        
124        private Shape makeCircle(double xc, double yc, int i) {
125                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
126                Pnt2d start = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(i, 0));
127                path.moveTo(start.getX(), start.getY());
128                for (int j = 1; j <= Q; j++) {
129                        Pnt2d pnt = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(i, j % Q));
130                        path.lineTo(pnt.getX(), pnt.getY());
131                }
132                return path;
133        }
134        
135        private Shape makeSpoke(double xc, double yc, int j) {
136                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
137                Pnt2d outer = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(P - 1, j));
138                Pnt2d inner = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(0, j));
139                path.moveTo(outer.getX(), outer.getY());
140                path.lineTo(inner.getX(), inner.getY());
141                return path;
142        }
143        
144        // --------- mouse event handling --------------------
145        
146        @Override
147        public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
148                if (e.isControlDown()) {
149                        finish();
150                }
151                else {
152                        double xc = sourceCv.offScreenXD(e.getX());
153                        double yc = sourceCv.offScreenYD(e.getY());
154                        //IJ.log("Mouse pressed: " + xc +","+yc);
155                        //IJ.log("Mag = " + canvas.getMagnification());
156                        mapAndUpdate(xc, yc);
157                }
158        }
159
160        @Override
161        public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent arg0) {}
162        @Override
163        public void mouseExited(MouseEvent arg0) {}
164        @Override
165        public void mousePressed(MouseEvent arg0) {}
166        @Override
167        public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent arg0) {}
168        
169        // ----------------------------------------------------
170        
171        boolean getUserInput() {
172                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
173                gd.addNumericField("Radial steps (P)", P, 0);
174                gd.addNumericField("Angular steps (Q) ", Q, 0);
175                gd.addNumericField("Max. radius (rmax)", rmax, 1);
176                gd.addNumericField("Min. radius (rmin)", rmin, 1);
177                gd.addCheckbox("Draw sampling grid", ShowSamplingGrid);
178                gd.addEnumChoice("Overlay color", OverlayColorChoice);
179                
180                gd.addMessage("Click left in source image to start,\n" +
181                                          "click ctrl+left to terminate.");
182                
183                gd.showDialog();
184                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
185                        return false;
186                }
187                
188                P = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
189                Q = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
190                rmax = gd.getNextNumber();
191                rmin = gd.getNextNumber();
192                ShowSamplingGrid = gd.getNextBoolean();
193                OverlayColorChoice = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
194                return true;
195        }
196}
